INSERT INTO tbl_frwl_agent_job (seq, fa_seq, org_seq, pcm_uuid, pcm_name, insert_dt )
SELECT arr[i]::int, pa_seq, #{org_seq} as org_seq, #{pcm_uuid} as pcm_uuid, (select sm_name from tbl_security_mngr where sm_gubun = 'P' and sm_seq = arr[i]::int), now()
FROM ( SELECT generate_series(1, array_upper(arr, 1)) AS i, arr, pa_seq FROM ( select regexp_split_to_array(CASE WHEN ppm_seq = '' THEN '0' ELSE ppm_seq END, ',') arr, seq as pa_seq from tbl_frwl_applc where org_seq = #{org_seq} OFFSET 0 limit 1 ) t ) t

SELECT seq, org_seq, insert_dt, frwl_seq as pa_seq, (CASE WHEN ppm_seq = '' THEN '0' ELSE ppm_seq END ) as ppm_seq FROM tbl_frwl_applc_history where org_seq = #{org_seq} and frwl_seq = #{fa_seq}::int
UNION all
(SELECT seq, org_seq, insert_dt, frwl_seq as pa_seq, (CASE WHEN ppm_seq = '' THEN '0' ELSE ppm_seq END ) as ppm_seq FROM tbl_frwl_applc_history where org_seq = #{org_seq} and insert_dt < now() order by insert_dt desc OFFSET 0 limit 1 )

SELECT CASE WHEN TB.pcm_uuid is null THEN 'INS' ELSE 'NOINS' END AS gubun, TA.sm_seq as pcm_seq, TA.org_seq, TA.fa_seq as pa_seq, TA.pcm_uuid, TA.pcm_name, TA.insert_dt, TB.fa_seq as old_pa_seq, TB.pcm_uuid as old_pcm_uuid, (select sm_port from tbl_security_mngr where sm_seq = TA.sm_seq) AS sm_port FROM tbl_frwl_agent_job TA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_frwl_agent_job WHERE fa_seq = #{old_pa_seq} and pcm_uuid = #{pcm_uuid} ) TB on TA.sm_seq = TB.sm_seq WHERE TA.org_seq = #{org_seq} and TA.fa_seq in ( #{new_pa_seq}, #{old_pa_seq} ) and TA.sm_seq in ( ${ppm_seq} ) and TB.pcm_uuid is null and TA.pcm_uuid = #{pcm_uuid} and TA.pcm_name is not null
